plantActivityDescription: Comprehensive logging for individual plants. Track nutrients, pH/EC levels, training techniques (LST, HST, topping), defoliation, transplanting, pest treatments, and more.
quickWateringDescription: Simple and fast watering logs. Just select a plant, add ingredients, and optional notes. Good for quick daily tracking.
environmentDescription: Two modes: (1) Log environmental conditions like temperature, humidity, and light hours. (2) Bulk plant updates - apply the same activity to all plants in an environment at once.
tip1: Use <bold>Bulk Updates</bold> when watering or feeding all plants in an environment with the same solution.
tip2: Track <bold>pH and EC</bold> of your runoff to monitor nutrient uptake and salt buildup.
tip3: Log <bold>training activities</bold> to track how your plants respond to different techniques.

environment.applyToAllPlants: Apply to all plants in environment
